admission_text:
##  Give A Gift 

##  Membership 

Whether you live in Washington, DC, or beyond, becoming a member of International Arts & Artists helps support our mission to promote cross-cultural understanding through the arts. Our membership program offers you the opportunity to engage with like-minded community members committed to advancing our core programs while giving you the benefits of membership.

As a prospective member, you can choose from a menu that is tailored to your unique interests and level of contribution. As members, you will receive news about upcoming exhibitions, programs, and events, along with special offerings for each member group.

Sign up today! (link to [https://www.athillyer.org/become-a-member](https://www.athillyer.org/become-a-member))

### From the Deep:

[Learn More](https://www.artsandartists.org/exhibitions/from-the-deep/)

#  International Arts & Artists' Services 

[ ](https://www.artsandartists.org/traveling-exhibition-service/about/)

### Traveling Exhibition Service

Organizes traveling exhibitions in all disciplines, styles, and media that are designed for both large and small museums and other cultural institutions in the United States and abroad. [Learn More +](https://www.artsandartists.org/wordpress2019/traveling-exhibition-service/about/)

[ ](https://www.artsandartists.org/cultural-exchange-programs/about/)

### Cultural Exchange Programs

Provides J-1 visa assistance and exchange opportunities for students, professionals, artists, and researchers from abroad participating in programs across the United States. [Learn More +](https://www.artsandartists.org/wordpress2019/cultural-exchange-programs/about/)

[ ](https://www.artsandartists.org/iaa-at-hillyer/)

### IA&A at Hillyer

Contemporary art center in Washington, DC dedicated to supporting underrepresented artists and serving the public with engaging exhibitions and programming. [Learn More +](https://www.artsandartists.org/wordpress2019/iaa-at-hillyer/)

##  IA&A's Hechinger Collection
